Bash(git tag -a v0.1.0-beta.1 -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
v0.1.0-beta.1 - Web Interface MVP

First beta release of GAO-Dev Web Interface for beta testers.

Key Features:
- Full web interface with React + Vite + TypeScript
- Real-time WebSocket communication with Brian agent
- Resizable panel layouts with layout presets (Default, Code-Focused, Chat-Focused)
- DM conversations with agents
- Ceremony channels for sprint events
- Git timeline with commit history and Monaco diff viewer
- Workflow visualization with dependency graphs
- Kanban board with virtual scrolling
- File browser with syntax-highlighted editor
- Activity feed with real-time updates
- Provider selection settings panel
- Dark/light theme support

Epic Highlights:
- Epic 39.1-39.7: Core UI components
- Epic 39.8: Unified Chat/Channels/DM Interface
- Epic 39.9: Customizable Layout & UX Polish (Foundation)

This is a beta release for testing and feedback.
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix(cli): Pass config_loader as keyword argument to GitManager in init command

The init command was passing ConfigLoader as a positional argument to
GitManager, but GitManager expects it as a keyword argument. This caused
a TypeError on Python 3.14 when attempting to convert the ConfigLoader
to a Path.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git -C "C:/Projects/gao-agile-dev" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix(web): Fix undefined property access in OnboardingWizard and MainContent

Fixed three critical bugs causing ''Cannot read properties of undefined'' errors:

1. OnboardingWizard.tsx: Added optional chaining for API response fields
   - Backend doesn''t return project_defaults, git_defaults, available_providers
   - Now uses safe fallbacks: data.project_defaults?.name || ''''
   - Prevents crash on initialization when API returns minimal data

2. MainContent.tsx: Fixed null vs undefined checks
   - Changed from !== null to != null to catch both values
   - Prevents rendering DMConversationView with undefined agent
   - Uses intentional type coercion for proper guard

3. App.tsx: Fixed loading state race condition
   - Waits for needsOnboarding !== null before rendering
   - Prevents premature rendering during async initialization
   - Three-state boolean pattern (null | true | false)

All fixes ensure graceful handling of missing/undefined data.
Tested with fresh onboarding flow.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
